name: Glyph of Last Stand
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Last Stand ability by ${$58376m1/-60000} min.

name: Glyph of Sunder Armor
description: Your Sunder Armor ability affects a second nearby target.

name: Glyph of Sweeping Strikes
description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sweeping Strikes ability by $58384s1%.

name: Glyph of Taunt
description: Increases the chance for your Taunt ability to succeed by $58353m1%.

name: Glyph of Resonating Power
description: Reduces the rage cost of your Thunder Clap ability by ${$58356m1/-10}.

name: Glyph of Victory Rush
description: Your Victory Rush ability has a $58382s1% increased critical strike chance.

name: Glyph of Whirlwind
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind by ${$58370m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Anti-Magic Shell
description: Increases the duration of your Anti-Magic Shell by ${$58623m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Heart Strike
description: Your Heart Strike also reduces the movement speed of your target by $58617s1% for $58617d.

name: Glyph of Blood Tap
description: Your Blood Tap no longer causes damage to you.

name: Glyph of Bone Shield
description: Adds $58673s1 additional $Lcharge:charges; to your Bone Shield.

name: Glyph of Chains of Ice
description: Your Chains of Ice also causes $58621s1 Frost damage, increased by your attack power.

name: Glyph of Dark Command
description: Increases the chance for your Dark Command ability to work successfully by $58613s1%.

name: Glyph of Death's Embrace
description: Your Death Coil refunds 20 runic power when used to heal.

name: Glyph of Death Grip
description: When you deal a killing blow that grants honor or experience, the cooldown of your Death Grip is refreshed.

name: Glyph of Death and Decay
description: Damage of your Death and Decay spell increased by $58629s1%.

name: Glyph of Frost Strike
description: Reduces the cost of your Frost Strike by ${$58647m1/-10} Runic Power.

name: Glyph of Horn of Winter
description: Increases the duration of your Horn of Winter ability by ${$58680m1/60000} min.

name: Glyph of Icebound Fortitude
description: Your Icebound Fortitude now always grants at least $58625s1% damage reduction, regardless of your defense skill.

name: Glyph of Icy Touch
description: Your Frost Fever disease deals $58631s1% additional damage.

name: Glyph of Obliterate
description: Increases the damage of your Obliterate ability by $m1%.

name: Glyph of Plague Strike
description: Your Plague Strike does $58657s1% additional damage.

name: Glyph of the Ghoul
description: Your Ghoul receives an additional $58686s1% of your Strength and $58686s1% of your Stamina.

name: Glyph of Rune Strike
description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Rune Strike by $58669s2%.

name: Glyph of Scourge Strike
description: Your Scourge Strike increases the duration of your diseases on the target by $58642m1 sec, up to a maximum of $58642m2 additional seconds.

name: Glyph of Strangulate
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Strangulate by ${$58618m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Unbreakable Armor
description: Increases the total armor granted by Unbreakable Armor to $58635m2%.

name: Glyph of Vampiric Blood
description: Increases  the duration of your Vampiric Blood by ${$58676m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Corpse Explosion
description: Increases the radius of effect on Corpse Explosion by $59307s1 yards.

name: Glyph of Pestilence
description: Increases the radius of your Pestilence effect by $59309s1 yards.

name: Glyph of Raise Dead
description: Your Raise Dead spell no longer requires a reagent.

name: Glyph of Dash
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by $59219s1%.

name: Glyph of Ghost Wolf
description: Your Ghost Wolf form regenerates an additional $59289s1% of your maximum health every 5 sec.

name: Glyph of Rune Tap
description: Your Rune Tap heals yourself for an additional 10% of the effect, and also heals your party for 10% of their maximum health.

name: Glyph of Blood Strike
description: Your Blood Strike causes an additional 20% damage to snared targets.

name: Glyph of Death Strike
description: Increases your Death Strike's damage by $59336s1% for every $59336s1 runic power you currently have (up to a maximum of $59336s2%).  The runic power is not consumed by this effect.

name: Glyph of Holy Wrath
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Wrath spell by ${$56420m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Seal of Righteousness
description: Increases the damage done by Seal of Righteousness by $56414s1%.

name: Glyph of Seal of Vengeance
description: Your Seal of Vengeance or Seal of Corruption also grants $56416s1 expertise while active.

name: Glyph of Raise Dead
description: Your Raise Dead spell no longer requires a reagent.

name: Glyph of Frostfire
description: Increases the initial damage dealt by Frostfire Bolt by $61205s1% and its critical strike chance by $61205s2%.

name: Glyph of Blast Wave
description: The mana cost of your Blast Wave spell is reduced by $62126s1%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

name: Glyph of Typhoon
description: Reduces the cost of your Typhoon spell by $62135s1% and increases its radius by $62135s2 yards, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

name: Glyph of Thunderstorm
description: Increases the mana you receive from your Thunderstorm spell by $62132s1%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

name: Glyph of Focus
description: Increases the damage done by Starfall by $62080s2%, but decreases its radius by $62080s1%.

name: Glyph of Arcane Blast
description: Increases the damage from your Arcane Blast buff by $62210s1%.

name: Glyph of Berserk
description: Increases the duration of Berserk by ${$62969m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Wild Growth
description: Wild Growth can affect $62970s1 additional target.

name: Glyph of Nourish
description: Your Nourish heals an additional $62971s1% for each of your heal over time effects present on the target.

name: Glyph of Savage Roar
description: Your Savage Roar ability grants an additional $63055s1% bonus damage done.

name: Glyph of Monsoon
description: Reduces the cooldown of your Typhoon spell by ${$63056m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Barkskin
description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by $63057s1% while Barkskin is active.

name: Glyph of Chimera Shot
description: Reduces the cooldown of Chimera Shot by ${$63065m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Explosive Shot
description: Increases the critical strike chance of Explosive Shot by $63066s1%.

name: Glyph of Kill Shot
description: Reduces the cooldown of Kill Shot by ${$63067m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Explosive Trap
description: The periodic damage from your Explosive Trap can now be critical strikes.

name: Glyph of Scatter Shot
description: Increases the range of Scatter Shot by $63069s1 yards.

name: Glyph of Raptor Strike
description: Reduces damage taken by $63087s1% for $63087d after using Raptor Strike.

name: Glyph of Deep Freeze
description: Increases the range of Deep Freeze by $63090s1 yards.

name: Glyph of Living Bomb
description: The periodic damage from your Living Bomb can now be critical strikes.

name: Glyph of Arcane Barrage
description: Reduces the mana cost of Arcane Barrage by $63092s1%.

name: Glyph of Mirror Image
description: Your Mirror Image spell now creates a 4th copy.

name: Glyph of Ice Barrier
description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Ice Barrier by $63095s1%.

name: Glyph of Beacon of Light
description: Increases the duration of Beacon of Light by ${$63218m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Hammer of the Righteous
description: Your Hammer of the Righteous hits $63219s1 additional target.

name: Glyph of Divine Storm
description: Your Divine Storm now heals for an additional $63220s1% of the damage it causes.

name: Glyph of Shield of Righteousness
description: Reduces the mana cost of Shield of Righteousness by $63222s1%.

name: Glyph of Divine Plea
description: While Divine Plea is active, you take $63223s1% reduced damage from all sources.

name: Glyph of Holy Shock
description: Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by ${$63224m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Salvation
description: When you cast Hand of Salvation on yourself, it also reduces damage taken by $63225s1%.

name: Glyph of Dispersion
description: Reduces the cooldown on Dispersion by ${$63229m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Guardian Spirit
description: If your Guardian Spirit lasts its entire duration without being triggered, the cooldown is reset to ${$63231m1/60} min.

name: Glyph of Penance
description: Reduces the cooldown of Penance by ${$63235m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Mind Sear
description: Increases the radius of effect on Mind Sear by $63237s1 yards.

name: Glyph of Hymn of Hope
description: Your Hymn of Hope lasts an additional ${$63246m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Pain Suppression
description: Allows Pain Suppression to be cast while stunned.

name: Glyph of Hunger for Blood
description: Increases the bonus damage from Hunger For Blood by $63249s1%.

name: Glyph of Killing Spree
description: Reduces the cooldown on Killing Spree by ${$63252m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Shadow Dance
description: Increases the duration of Shadow Dance by ${$63253m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Fan of Knives
description: Increases the damage done by Fan of Knives by $63254s1%.

name: Glyph of Tricks of the Trade
description: The bonus damage and threat redirection granted by your Tricks of the Trade ability lasts an additional ${$63256m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Mutilate
description: Reduces the cost of Mutilate by $63268s1 energy.

name: Glyph of Cloak of Shadows
description: While Cloak of Shadows is active, you take $63269s1% less physical damage.

name: Glyph of Thunder
description: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by ${$63270m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Feral Spirit
description: Your spirit wolves gain an additional $63271s1% of your attack power.

name: Glyph of Riptide
description: Increases the duration of Riptide by ${$63273m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Earth Shield
description: Increases the amount healed by your Earth Shield by $63279s1%.

name: Glyph of Totem of Wrath
description: When you cast Totem of Wrath, you gain $63280s1% of the totem's bonus spell power for $63283d.

name: Glyph of Hex
description: Increases the damage your Hex target can take before the Hex effect is removed by $63291s1%.

name: Glyph of Stoneclaw Totem
description: Your Stoneclaw Totem also places a damage absorb shield on you, equal to $63298s1 times the strength of the shield it places on your totems.

name: Glyph of Haunt
description: The bonus damage granted by your Haunt spell is increased by an additional $63302s1%.

name: Glyph of Metamorphosis
description: Increases the duration of your Metamorphosis by ${$63303m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Chaos Bolt
description: Reduces the cooldown on Chaos Bolt by ${$63304m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Demonic Circle
description: Reduces the cooldown on Demonic Circle by ${$63309m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Shadowflame
description: Your Shadowflame also applies a $63310s1% movement speed slow on its victims.

name: Glyph of Life Tap
description: When you use Life Tap or Dark Pact, you gain $63321s1% of your Spirit as spell power for $63321d.

name: Glyph of Soul Link
description: Increases the percentage of damage shared via your Soul Link by an additional $63312s1%.

name: Glyph of Bladestorm
description: Reduces the cooldown on Bladestorm by ${$63324m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Shockwave
description: Reduces the cooldown on Shockwave by ${$63325m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Vigilance
description: Your Vigilance ability transfers an additional $63326s1% of your target's threat to you.

name: Glyph of Enraged Regeneration
description: Your Enraged Regeneration ability heals for an additional ${$63327m1*10}% of your health over its duration.

name: Glyph of Spell Reflection
description: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by ${$63328m1/-1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Shield Wall
description: Reduces the cooldown on Shield Wall by ${$63329m1/-60000} min, but Shield Wall now only reduces damage taken by ${60-$63329m2}%.

name: Glyph of Dancing Rune Weapon
description: Increases the duration of Dancing Rune Weapon by ${$63330m1/1000} sec.

name: Glyph of Hungering Cold
description: Reduces the cost of Hungering Cold by ${$63331m1/-10} runic power.

name: Glyph of Unholy Blight
description: Increases the damage done by Unholy Blight by $63332s1%.

name: Glyph of Dark Death
description: Increases the damage or healing done by Death Coil by $63333s1%.

name: Glyph of Disease
description: Your Pestilence ability now refreshes disease durations and secondary effects of diseases on your primary target back to their maximum duration.

name: Glyph of Howling Blast
description: Your Howling Blast ability now infects your targets with Frost Fever.

name: Glyph of Envenom
description: Your Envenom ability no longer consumes Deadly Poison from your target.

name: Glyph of Survival Instincts
description: Your Survival Instincts ability grants an additional $65243s1% of your maximum health.

name: Glyph of Claw
description: Reduces the energy cost of your Claw ability by $67598s1.

name: Glyph of Command
description: Increases the duration of your Commanding Shout ability by ${$68164m1/60000} min.

name: Glyph of Eternal Water
description: Your Summon Water Elemental now lasts indefinitely, but your Water Elemental can no longer cast Freeze.

name: Glyph of Quick Decay
description: Your haste now reduces the time between periodic damage ticks of your Corruption spell.

name: Glyph of Rapid Rejuvenation
description: Your haste now reduces the time between the periodic healing ticks of your Rejuvenation spell.
